name: Mother Goose: Rhymes to Color
overview: Mother Goose: Rhymes to Color is an animated activity book for children. Linda Arnold sings twenty-six popular Mother Goose nursery rhymes. Each rhyme is accompanied with a coloring puzzle. Players use the controller to colour in the pictures, once this is done the picture becomes animated to reward the player. Songs include: Little Bo-Peep, Old Woman Who Loves In A Shoe, Humpty Dumpty, Simple Simon and Pat-a-Cake.
